title: Modern Wreath Workshop with Hollyflora (Heath LA, Sat 11 am)
desc: Create a lovely organic modern wreath this fall with the help of Holly and Becky of Hollyflora. They?ll gather and provide local twigs, foliage, berries, cones, australian natives, grasses and fruit to give your wreath an informal forest floor feel. They?ll give considered and creative guidance from the very basic beginning skills to creating your own artistic vision. The cost to participate is $80 and includes the workshop and all materials. Suitable for adults only.  Advance RSVP and payment required.
